description: A humorous play on words with 'small medium'
title: Small Medium
n_1: A police officer is holding a wanted poster.
c1_1: We have a warrant out for a small medium.
n_2: The psychic looks surprised and confused.
c1_2: Yes, a small medium at large.
n_3: The police officer nods while the psychic smirks.
c1_3: We need to catch this person.
n_4: Both characters share a moment of realization.
